text:
From Alia Bhatt To Akshay Kumar, Bollywood Celebs Rang In Christmas With Love, Laughter & Fun
From Alia Bhatt To Akshay Kumar, Bollywood Celebs Rang In Christmas With Love, Laughter & Fun
Christmas is always full of love, joy and cheerfulness. Like most of us, Bollywood celebrities also love spending time with their families especially during festivals.
New Year is around the corner and party mode is on for Bollywood celebs.
From Alia Bhatt to Akshay Kumar, here’s how everyone spread Christmas cheer.
Salman threw a grand party for his family and friends. Sharing a video of him dancing with his brothers, he killed it like never before. It was surely a night to remember.
Akshay Kumar turned Santa!
Alia Bhatt wore a reindeer headband!
From B-town kids to the Kapoor clan, here’s how everyone celebrated Christmas.
Don't Miss 893 SHARES
title: From Alia Bhatt To Akshay Kumar, Bollywood Celebs Celebrated Christmas With Love & Affection
